cyclone.name: KATIA
cyclone.current_location: about 80 mi (125 km) E of Tampico, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Drifting eastward, then slowly southward, expected to meander in the southwestern Gulf and ultimately move toward the Veracruz coast of Mexico

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southwestern Gulf coast of Mexico from Tampico southward to Veracruz
weather_observation.wind: Only a very small (â‰¤6%) chance of tropical-storm-force winds; otherwise breezy conditions at most.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected for the Texas coast.
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rain bands may bring isolated showers; widespread heavy rain is not expected.
weather_observation.other_hazards: None of significance for port operations
